Call calc progs to obtain information normally passed from screen
What To do= 'O'
S: OK/Select
raise ok for parent
Verify user competence
If competence exceeded send Msg and return online
msg ID0021 "competence exceeded"
User competence not exceeded
Check existence of Delcredere client
CLNT Delcr does not exists and amount <> 0: send msg & return online
msg ID0022 "Delcredere client not availabele"
Delcredere&cost= 0 or CLNT(delcr) exists confirm OK
msg ID0023 "Confirm update?" Y/N
User Reply N, return online
User Reply Y, start batch and exit
fist update debtor(s)
raise ok for parent
End confirm OK
End delcredere & cost=0 or delcredere client exists
End user competence not exceeded
End no lines IDCR and delcredere + costs = 0
20.02.2003 If pi.ImmediateBooking = true only handle "OK" part and exit after
End Ok/select
WTD=C: Cancel, exit
WTD=R; request OJ docs and exit
if own judgement supplied close OID300
Raise OK for parent
Else return online
WTD='P' payment letter
WTD='D' denial letter
WTD=E, Save and exit (end with no decision yet)
DEBC_LEGCOSTHELLER, read first non-0 as init, write entry to all
No decision yet, End program, save and exit
Non display
Recalculate on change of percentage
-- In case of GSET_YESNO(153) ='Y' the value date is mandatory

SQL_STMT_U.val: select min(invo_datstartdelcredereinvst) from :1/invo where invo_admno = :2 and invo_clntno = :3 and invo_debh_no = :4 and invo_aactuali > 0 for read only

Letter type
C: invoices + costs (default)
B: invoices no costs
D: costst no invoices

write "fixed" text to temp table
Merge invoices (table 2) first to determine start date for credit limit history
Then write subsequent limit decisions

write limit at invoice date
Merge temptable to document and clear temp table
